metadata.title: KingSize Men's Big & Tall Embossed Leather Bomber Jacket
features: BIG AND TALL SIZING: You should order Tall if you are 6'2" or taller. You should order Big if you are 6'1" or shorter

Our Embossed Leather Bomber Jacket has a vintage feel right out of the box and feels just as comfortable. It's made from premium leather and has an easy zip front and the ribbed elastic cuffs and hem offer a custom-feeling fit.
Vintage look . Ribbed elastic cuffs and hem . Side pockets . Leather

ABOUT THE BRAND: KingSize has been dedicated to the style and comfort of the big & tall man since 1920. We design our clothes and accessories from the ground-up, to meet the daily demands of our customer; putting his needs, concerns, and ease of use above all else. We are proud to call ourselves the one and only Big & Tall Experts.
description: Our Embossed Leather Bomber Jacket has a vintage feel right out of the box and feels just as comfortable. It's made from premium leather and has an easy zip front and the ribbed elastic cuffs and hem offer a custom-feeling fit.  Relaxed fit Zip front Vintage look Ribbed elastic cuffs and hem Side pockets LeatherMachine wash; imported  Big length approx. 30"Tall length approx. 32"
